author: julianfoad
msg: Fix an obscure bug with updating deletions, and add a regression test for it.
If a directory has been deleted in the repository, and only a child of it has
been updated (and thereby deleted) in the WC, then a subsequent attempt to
update the directory in the WC would fail.
I discovered the anomaly in the source code; Greg Hudson analysed it,
determined the consequences, and devised a recipe to demonstrate it; I patched
the source code (changed one letter) and wrote the regression test.
* subversion/libsvn_repos/reporter.c
(delta_dirs): Fix a typo responsible for a previously undiscovered bug.
* subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/update_tests.py
(update_deletion_inside_out): New test.
(test_list): Add the new test.
